menuitem.name: Conectar usuar_io
menuitem.enabled: (dw.getActiveWindow(true) != null && dw.getActiveWindow(true).allowsEdits()) && !site.serverActivity() && dw.getFocus() != 'browser' && dw.getDocumentDOM() != null && dw.getDocumentDOM().getParseMode() == 'html'
